Module Hierarchy

  • sqltriples: A simple SQL-accessible RDF triple store.
    • Adapters: Database-specific adapter classes.
    • Query: Database querying classes.
    • Store: RDF triple store classes.
    • Types: Special data types inheriting from the unicode type in order to provide interoperability with rdflib.

Class Hierarchy

  • __builtin__.object: The most base type...
    • __builtin__.basestring: Type basestring cannot be instantiated; it is the base for str and unicode.
      • __builtin__.unicode: unicode(string [, encoding[, errors]]) -> object Create a new Unicode object from the given encoded string.
        • sqltriples.Types.Special
          • sqltriples.Types.Literal: A literal compatible with the rdflib class of the same name.
          • sqltriples.Types.URIRef: An URI reference compatible with the rdflib class of the same name.
            • sqltriples.Types.Namespace: A namespace compatible with the rdflib class of the same name.
    • __builtin__.type: type(object) -> the object's type...
  • exceptions.Exception: Common base class for all exceptions.
    • sqltriples.Query.NotSupportedError
  • sqltriples.Adapters.Adapter
    • sqltriples.Adapters.PgSQLAdapter
    • sqltriples.Adapters.pysqlite2Adapter
  • sqltriples.Query.AbstractQuery
    • sqltriples.Query.Query: An abstract class providing support for lazy query evaluation.
      • sqltriples.Query.Results: A class representing a selection of results obtained by specifying a pattern.
        • sqltriples.Query.CountableResults: A class representing a count of some results.
        • sqltriples.Query.SingleResults: A class representing a selection of single value results.
          • sqltriples.Query.Objects: A class representing a selection of objects.
            • sqltriples.Query.ConjunctionOfObjects
            • sqltriples.Query.DisjunctionOfObjects
            • sqltriples.Query.IntersectionOfObjects
            • sqltriples.Query.NegationOfObjects
          • sqltriples.Query.Predicates: A class representing a selection of predicates.
            • sqltriples.Query.ConjunctionOfPredicates
            • sqltriples.Query.DisjunctionOfPredicates
            • sqltriples.Query.IntersectionOfPredicates
            • sqltriples.Query.NegationOfPredicates
          • sqltriples.Query.Subjects: A class representing a selection of subjects.
            • sqltriples.Query.ConjunctionOfSubjects
            • sqltriples.Query.DisjunctionOfSubjects
            • sqltriples.Query.IntersectionOfSubjects
            • sqltriples.Query.NegationOfSubjects
        • sqltriples.Query.Triples: A class representing a selection of triples.
          • sqltriples.Query.ConjunctionOfTriples
          • sqltriples.Query.DisjunctionOfTriples
          • sqltriples.Query.IntersectionOfTriples
          • sqltriples.Query.NegationOfTriples
        • sqltriples.Query.Tuples: A class representing a selection of triples.
          • sqltriples.Query.ConjunctionOfTuples
          • sqltriples.Query.DisjunctionOfTuples
          • sqltriples.Query.IntersectionOfTuples
          • sqltriples.Query.NegationOfTuples
    • sqltriples.Query.Subject: A class representing a more conveniently accessible subject.
  • sqltriples.Query.CombinedResults
    • sqltriples.Query.CombinedTopLevelResults
      • sqltriples.Query.Intersection
        • sqltriples.Query.IntersectionOfObjects
        • sqltriples.Query.IntersectionOfPredicates
        • sqltriples.Query.IntersectionOfSubjects
        • sqltriples.Query.IntersectionOfTriples
        • sqltriples.Query.IntersectionOfTuples
    • sqltriples.Query.Conjunction
      • sqltriples.Query.ConjunctionOfObjects
      • sqltriples.Query.ConjunctionOfPredicates
      • sqltriples.Query.ConjunctionOfSubjects
      • sqltriples.Query.ConjunctionOfTriples
      • sqltriples.Query.ConjunctionOfTuples
    • sqltriples.Query.Disjunction
      • sqltriples.Query.DisjunctionOfObjects
      • sqltriples.Query.DisjunctionOfPredicates
      • sqltriples.Query.DisjunctionOfSubjects
      • sqltriples.Query.DisjunctionOfTriples
      • sqltriples.Query.DisjunctionOfTuples
  • sqltriples.Query.Negation: A class representing the negation of other results.
    • sqltriples.Query.NegationOfObjects
    • sqltriples.Query.NegationOfPredicates
    • sqltriples.Query.NegationOfSubjects
    • sqltriples.Query.NegationOfTriples
    • sqltriples.Query.NegationOfTuples
  • sqltriples.Store.TripleStore: A triple store whose contents are stored in an SQL-accessible database table.
  • sqltriples.Types.AbstractExpression
    • sqltriples.Types.Expression
  • sqltriples.Types.BNode: A BNode compatible with the rdflib class of the same name.
  • sqltriples.Types.Defined: A class indicating a value defined for a particular relation.
  • sqltriples.Types.Pattern
